name: natural_environment
description: Urban ecosystems, biodiversity protection, and green infrastructure enhancement

proposals.text: Remove protected status from all urban natural areas and mandate the removal of existing green infrastructure, replacing with impervious surfaces.
proposals.rationale: Actively degrades urban ecosystems by removing protection and destroying natural climate buffers, increasing heat island effects and reducing natural carbon sinks

proposals.text: Eliminate urban forestry programs and redirect all tree maintenance funds to hardscape development.
proposals.rationale: Deliberately reduces urban forest capacity to sequester carbon and provide natural cooling

proposals.text: Restrict all habitat corridor development and require fragmentation of existing natural areas during development.
proposals.rationale: Systematically weakens ecosystem resilience by preventing wildlife movement and adaptation

proposals.text: Mandate removal of native vegetation in public spaces and replace with non-native ornamental species.
proposals.rationale: Enforces practices that reduce biodiversity and ecosystem resilience to climate changes

proposals.text: Cap green space requirements at 5% of development area regardless of ecosystem value.
proposals.rationale: Actively limits natural area preservation and ecosystem services

proposals.text: Document existing urban tree canopy coverage without implementing protection measures.
proposals.rationale: Provides basic monitoring without preserving natural climate benefits

proposals.text: Allow optional preservation of mature trees during development if not conflicting with construction.
proposals.rationale: Permits but doesn't prioritize preservation of natural carbon sinks

proposals.text: Conduct basic biodiversity surveys in public parks with voluntary conservation guidelines.
proposals.rationale: Creates awareness of ecosystem values without requiring protection

proposals.text: Install interpretive signage about ecosystem services in major natural areas.
proposals.rationale: Provides education without active ecosystem enhancement

proposals.text: Consider both ecosystem services and development needs equally in land use decisions.
proposals.rationale: Balances natural and built environment without preference

proposals.text: Maintain current urban forest with one-to-one replacement of removed trees.
proposals.rationale: Takes neutral approach to natural resource management

proposals.text: Create public dashboard tracking urban ecosystem health indicators city-wide.
proposals.rationale: Promotes transparency and awareness of natural system conditions

proposals.text: Offer 25% density bonuses for developments that preserve significant natural areas.
proposals.rationale: Provides meaningful incentives for ecosystem protection

proposals.text: Require all new developments to achieve no net loss of ecosystem services through on-site preservation or mitigation.
proposals.rationale: Sets mandatory but achievable ecosystem protection standards

proposals.text: Implement green corridor network connecting all major natural areas with native vegetation.
proposals.rationale: Creates substantial ecosystem connectivity for climate adaptation

proposals.text: Mandate 40% tree canopy coverage in all neighborhoods through protection and new plantings within 5 years.
proposals.rationale: Strong requirements for expanding natural climate solutions

proposals.text: Create biodiversity zones requiring 60% of area dedicated to enhanced natural habitat.
proposals.rationale: Major investment in ecosystem enhancement

proposals.text: Establish comprehensive green infrastructure network achieving 75% stormwater management through natural systems.
proposals.rationale: Transformative approach to ecosystem-based adaptation

proposals.text: Require all developments to achieve net positive impact on biodiversity and ecosystem services.
proposals.rationale: Comprehensive transformation to regenerative development

proposals.text: Create living infrastructure mandate requiring integration of ecosystems into all municipal structures and spaces.
proposals.rationale: Near-complete transformation to nature-based urban systems

proposals.text: Mandate comprehensive ecosystem regeneration achieving 50% increase in biodiversity and natural carbon sequestration by 2026.
proposals.rationale: Complete transformation to regenerative ecosystem management
